description:
Experience Resident Evil 7 biohazard Cloud Gameplay Demo with a level visual fidelity beyond the norm for portable consoles through the power of the cloud

Menace and isolation seethe through the rotting walls of an abandoned farmhouse in the American South. Enter a terrifyingly new world of horror and survive.

Note: This demo is intended for the purpose of confirming the suitability of your internet connection for playing cloud-streamed content comfortably. It features a specially-tuned section from the opening of the game which can be played 3 times.
name: Resident Evil 7 biohazard Cloud Gameplay Demo
